name: JLB Web Design + Marketing
tagline: Beautiful Web Design, Support That Matters
description:
JLB’s (Joy, Life, Business) brand is about the heart of American business and is focused on how to give a business a big competitive edge online without a huge budget, all the confusion and poor support.  JLB originated in Nashville fifteen years ago (www.jlbworks.com) and the brand and client value has evolved and grown into a solid unique solution for businesses.
 
As a web design and marketing services agency for businesses, we focus on providing customers with world-class brand. the best web design (Forester Research has stated that web design is the #1 ROI for digital marketing), innovative website development, powerful digital marketing and business class website support in one central place without multiple vendors or confusion.
READ MORE...
